tool_name: Quotation Service for Domestic Helper Insurance
tool_description: This API provides quotations for Domestic Helper Insurance, allowing users to obtain pricing based on specific parameters.

api_list.name: quote
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts parameters to generate a quotation for Domestic Helper Insurance.

optional_parameters.name: nationality
optional_parameters.description: The nationality of the domestic helper.

optional_parameters.name: duty
optional_parameters.description: The specific duties of the domestic helper.

optional_parameters.name: plan_cd
optional_parameters.description: The code for the insurance plan selected.

optional_parameters.name: birthday
optional_parameters.description: The birthday of the domestic helper.

optional_parameters.name: eff_date
optional_parameters.description: The effective date for the insurance coverage.

optional_parameters.name: monthly_salary
optional_parameters.description: The monthly salary of the domestic helper.
